title: Get  java.nio.file.InvalidPathException on Windows  when compile  Quarkus 3.0.0.Final  Spring Cloud Config Client

labels.name: area/spring
labels.description: Issues relating to the Spring integration

body:
### Describe the bug


mvn -e  -Pquick-build
